rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a decorative arch and natural lighting, aligned with Vastu principles for energy flow.
Spacious living room featuring Mediterranean decor, large windows, and an open plan layout promoting family interaction, ensuring proper south-eastern alignment as per Vastu guidelines.
Modern dining area adjacent to the living room with Mediterranean-style furniture and ample natural light from eastern openings, supporting auspicious dining practices.
Fully equipped kitchen designed in a Mediterranean style with state-of-the-art appliances. North-western placement for optimal balance and energy flow.
Luxurious master bedroom featuring large windows, high-quality finishes, and private balcony for relaxation; positioned in the north-east to enhance mental clarity and vitality.
Cozy secondary bedroom with ample storage space and natural lighting. Placed in a balanced location, ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu norms.
Additional bedroom accommodating family members or guests, designed with Mediterranean decor and essential amenities; aligned for favorable energy flow.
Well-equipped master bathroom integrated with the master bedroom, featuring modern fixtures and Vastu-aligned placement.
Common bathroom shared by other bedrooms, ensuring functionality and adherence to layout norms.
Guest room designed for occasional visitors with comfortable seating, decor, and integrated storage solutions.
Multi-functional study or home office space with ample lighting and ergonomic design; positioned in the east for enhanced concentration as per Vastu guidelines.
Dedicated private gym area with versatile equipment, designed for fitness enthusiasts; strategically located to ensure privacy and optimal energy circulation.
